definition: this (person)
this/these/(commonly pr. [zhei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing)
position/location/place/seat/classifier for people (honorific)/classifier for binary bits (e.g. 十六位 16-bit or 2 bytes)/(physics) potential

sentences.english: The pity of it is that an intelligent man appears to have been seduced by the sound of his own voice.
sentences.chinese: 不幸的是，这位智者似乎被自己的声音误导了。

sentences.english: The leader had joined the army much earlier after graduating from high school.
sentences.chinese: 这位班长自打高中毕业后就入伍了。

sentences.english: Mengsk approached the smaller man and stood before him, an intimidating presence.
sentences.chinese: 蒙克斯以威迫的姿态靠近并站在这位小矮人前面。

sentences.english: All the old lady did was quote a scripture to you.
sentences.chinese: 这位剩女所做的就是念了一段经。

sentences.english: The new premier is forming his government mainly from young men.
sentences.chinese: 这位新总理主要从年轻人中物色人选组建政府。

sentences.english: This congressman is clever at making scores off hecklers at public meetings.
sentences.chinese: 这位国会议员擅长在公众集会上驳倒诘难者。

sentences.english: Duggan, a father of four, died of a single gunshot wound to the chest, an inquest at north London Coroner's Court heard on Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 验尸报告称，这位四岁小孩的父亲被枪击中胸腔致死。

sentences.english: Entirely devoted to the Party, the young soldier gave his life for his country.
sentences.chinese: 对党无限忠诚，这位年轻的士兵为祖国献出了生命。

sentences.english: My acquaintance confirmed that his fellow postmen were neither terribly nice nor terribly nasty.
sentences.chinese: 我这位熟人证明，他的同事们既不太好，也不太差。

sentences.english: The guy in blue told me they were teasing the silk.
sentences.chinese: 穿蓝衣的这位老哥告诉我他们正梳理的是Silk。

sentences.english: The young boxer has copped the prize of the first round.
sentences.chinese: 这位年轻的拳击手已获得了第一回合的胜利。

sentences.english: The lawyer has been appointed to mediate between the employers and the union leaders.
sentences.chinese: 这位律师被指定在雇主和工会领导人之间进行调解。

sentences.english: So the widow one day entreated me to sing it to her thus.
sentences.chinese: 因此这位寡妇有一天请求我用这调子唱给她听。

sentences.english: The actress is dressed by the best-known designer in Paris.
sentences.chinese: 这位女明星的衣服是由巴黎最知名的设计师提供的。

sentences.english: Nothing can beguile the old man.
sentences.chinese: 什么也欺骗不了这位老人。

definition: position/location/place/seat/classifier for people (honorific)/classifier for binary bits (e.g. 十六位 16-bit or 2 bytes)/(physics) potential
he or him/(used for either sex when the sex is unknown or unimportant)/(used before sb's name for emphasis)/(used as a meaningless mock object)/other/another
this/this one
plural marker for pronouns, and nouns referring to individuals
however/yet/but
young man/young guy/lad/youngster/CL:個|个[ge4]
to call oneself/to claim to be/to profess/to claim a title
see 的士[di1 shi4]
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
aim/clear
really and truly
oneself/one's own
unexpectedly/to one's surprise/in spite of everything/in that crazy way/actually/to go as far as to

that one/that thing/that (as opposed to this)/(used before a verb or adjective for emphasis)/(used to humorously or indirectly refer to sth embarrassing, funny etc, or when one can't think of the right word)/(used in speech as a filler, similar to "umm", "you know" etc)/(euph.) menstruation/sex/also pr. [nei4 ge5]
eldest of father's younger brothers/uncle (term used to address a man about the age of one's father)
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
but/however/(used for emphasis) indeed
in the capacity of/as
(completed action marker)/(modal particle indicating change of state, situation now)/(modal particle intensifying preceding clause)
unofficial variant of 瞭[liao4]
to finish/to achieve/variant of 瞭|了[liao3]/to understand clearly
(of eyes) bright/clear-sighted/to understand clearly
